name: SiO<sub>x</sub>C<sub>y</sub>H<sub>z</sub> polymeric coatings formed by plasma enhanced chemical vapor deposition, utilizing tetramethylsilane
FoodContactSubstance: SiO<sub>x</sub>C<sub>y</sub>H<sub>z</sub> polymeric coatings formed by plasma enhanced chemical vapor deposition, utilizing tetramethylsilane (CAS Reg. No. 75-76-3) and oxygen as the starting materials.
